pages.text: The $(mob)Vrontausaurus$() is an animal that spawns in $(thing)Mountains$(). It wanders around and fights back if attacked with melee attacks that shake its target's screen for a few seconds.$(p)Its meat is an excellent source of food, if it can be safely killed. It can also be bred with $(l:minecraft_pig)$(item)Porkchop$(), $(l:minecraft_cow)$(item)Beef$() or $(l:minecraft_sheep)$(item)Mutton$(), but only while it is raining.
$(mob)Vrontausauruses$() drop $(item)Vrontausaurus Fur$() on death. It can be crafted into the same things that mundane $(l:minecraft_cow)$(item)Leather$() can.

Brushing a $(mob)Vrontausaurus$() with a $(item)Brush$() gives $(item)Vrontausaurus Fur Tufts$(), which can be crafted into $(item)Vrontausaurus Fur$(). It can only be brushed a few times every few minutes, and brushing may release some electricity, dealing minor damage to the brusher.
